医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
关于长期使用可卡因或酒精对认知灵活性的破坏性影响的新见解据美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 称，估计美国有 5000 万人正在与可卡因或酒精使用障碍的挑战作斗争。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/New-insight-into-the-damaging-impact-of-chronic-cocaine-or-alcohol-use-on-cognitive-flexibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/New-insight-into-the-damaging-impact-of-chronic-cocaine-or-alcohol-use-on-cognitive-flexibility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb9d5a51-ba02-40a1-ad50-92575438eb7b Wed, 12 Jul 2023 01:37:20 -0400 New insight into the damaging impact of chronic cocaine or alcohol use on cognitive flexibility
布鲁克推出便携式 MOBILE-IR II 光谱仪，将实验室级 FT-IR 分析带入现场布鲁克光学宣布推出 MOBILE-IR II——一款便携式、电池供电的傅里叶变换红外 (FT-IR) 光谱仪，可提供实验室台式系统的高光谱性能。这款功能强大的移动光谱仪将使世界各地的用户能够将常规和先进的 FT-IR 应用带到现场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Bruker-launches-portable-MOBILE-IR-II-spectrometer-to-bring-laboratory-grade-FT-IR-analysis-to-the-field。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Bruker-launches-portable-MOBILE-IR-II-spectrometer-to-bring-laboratory-grade-FT-IR-analysis-to-the-field。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a2b0482-2b9c-47ef-acfc-fd0dc1b955cb Wed, 12 Jul 2023 01:27:00 -0400 Bruker launches portable MOBILE-IR II spectrometer to bring laboratory-grade FT-IR analysis to the field
怀孕期间接触 CBD 可能会损害发育中的胎儿科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员发现，通常用于治疗焦虑和恶心的大麻二酚 (CBD) 可能会损害发育中的胎儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/CBD-exposure-during-pregnancy-can-潜在-harm-a-developmenting-fetus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/CBD-exposure-during-pregnancy-can-潜在-harm-a-developmenting-fetus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4988266b-10e0-44a3-bd93-e27303990190 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 00:53:42 -0400 CBD exposure during pregnancy can potentially harm a developing fetus
镰状细胞病：全球行动呼吁减少镰状细胞病 (SCD) 的负担需要大量的财政和政治承诺，以改善数据收集、诊断、治疗和培训 - 这样做将对全世界数百万患者和家庭的生活产生积极影响 - 发表在《The》上的一个新委员会表示柳叶刀血液学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Sickle-cell-disease-A-global-call-to-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Sickle-cell-disease-A-global-call-to-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c238ad48-dd2a-43c1-af84-a89ecdbc9ead Wed, 12 Jul 2023 00:44:55 -0400 Sickle cell disease: A global call to action
术前高强度间歇训练可改善康复政策制定者应注意奥塔哥大学的一项研究，该研究证实，在手术前进行短期高强度间歇训练可以极大地帮助康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/High-intensity-interval-training-before-surgery-can-improve-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/High-intensity-interval-training-before-surgery-can-improve-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af7a82a1-b414-49cf-8b9c-b3f3f242f505 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 00:23:15 -0400 High-intensity interval training before surgery can improve recovery
研究揭示了自然界中一系列令人震惊的未经探索的蛋白质折叠一项开创性的研究为自然界中蛋白质结构及其折叠的惊人多样性提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Study-unveils-an-astounding-array-of-unexplored- Protein-folds-in-nature.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230712/Study-unveils-an-astounding-array-of-unexplored- Protein-folds-in-nature.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=010f3923-a026-4dbb-80df-f37daf71da68 Wed, 12 Jul 2023 00:11:14 -0400 Study unveils an astounding array of unexplored protein folds in nature
研究人员开发3D生物打印技术消除癌细胞全球首次开发出能够利用免疫细胞功能消除癌细胞的三维（3D）生物打印技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Researchers-develop-3D-bioprinting-technology-for-elimination-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Researchers-develop-3D-bioprinting-technology-for-elimination-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4de3c875-341f-444b-a011-531678ab1a7e Tue, 11 Jul 2023 23:19:00 -0400 Researchers develop 3D bioprinting technology for eliminating cancer cells
研究发现许多林奇综合征患者仍未确诊雪松-西奈癌症研究人员的新研究可能需要重新考虑当前的筛查指南，以纳入林奇综合征的一个尚未被充分认识的病因，林奇综合征是遗传性结直肠癌和子宫内膜癌的最常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Many-病人-with-Lynch-syndrome-remain-undiagnosed-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Many-病人-with-Lynch-syndrome-remain-undiagnosed-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91deff34-08e7-4916-b7da-11a1d8c46685 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 23:16:12 -0400 Many patients with Lynch syndrome remain undiagnosed, study finds
Hutchinson-Gilford 早衰症小鼠模型显示肝脏 H2S 水平降低一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 12 期，题为“Hepatic Hydrogen sulfidelevels are lowered in mouse”哈钦森-吉尔福德早衰综合症模型。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Mouse-model-of-Hutchinson-Gilford-progeria-syndrome-shows-reduction-in-hepatic-H2S-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Mouse-model-of-Hutchinson-Gilford-progeria-syndrome-shows-reduction-in-hepatic-H2S-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=250e0402-f473-43f0-aed9-21c6716dbf51 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 23:10:02 -0400 Mouse model of Hutchinson-Gilford progeria syndrome shows reduction in hepatic H2S levels
脂联素可能是肥胖和糖尿病的潜在治疗靶点脂联素是一种由脂肪组织分泌的激素，在保护胰腺功能方面发挥着双重重要作用：在瘦人中，它可以保护产生胰岛素的β细胞，而在肥胖者中，它可以逆转脂肪组织的损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Adiponectin-can-be-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-for-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230711/Adiponectin-can-be-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-for-obesity-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b63ed086-96e8-4f76-86b4-e16e6a4ddb24 Tue, 11 Jul 2023 22:52:15 -0400 Adiponectin can be a potential therapeutic target for obesity and diabetes
